fi.tuni.tiko

Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tuni.tiko.GameLogic

  • public class GameLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for handling changes of game state and ingame resources Dispatcher of events to classes that need to listen to that All elements that need to listen to game state or resource changes should subscribe to gameLogicListeners list

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GameLogic.GameState
      Enum to trigger correct events based on what state the game is currently in for instance clicking the play button in main menu will change change the game state to MAP_SELECTION and will trigger all the events needed for the settings screen
      static class  GameLogic.Language
      Enum for triggering correct events based on language setting

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      GameLogic()

      • setScore

        public static void setScore(int score)
        Calls update listeners to have listeners from delayed add included locks to have attempted changes to the iterated list be added to the delayed change lists instead dispatches the event to all listeners
        Parameters:
        score - score to be set

      • SetState

        public static void SetState(GameLogic.GameState state)
        the main function for moving the game from one state to another Initializes necessary things and calls SceneManager to have currently displayed Scene changes appropriately for the state change
        Parameters:
        state - gamestate to be set
